docs.lead_paragraph: As states finalize what benefits they want guaranteed under the new health care law, it is becoming increasingly clear that what services are received will vary in part by location.

headline.seo: Interest Groups Push to Fill Margins of Health Coverage
headline.main: Interest Groups Push to Fill Margins of Health Coverage
headline.print_headline: Interest Groups Push to Fill Margins of Health Coverage

docs.abstract: Main goal of new health care law is to guarantee medical coverage to nearly all Americans, but as states finalize their insurance benefits packages, it is becoming clear that what services are received will depend partly on location; interest groups are lobbying in different states to add services like chiropractor care and infertility treatments to package of essential benefits insurance must cover under the law.
docs.snippet: As states finalize what benefits they want guaranteed under the new health care law, it is becoming increasingly clear that what services are received will vary in part by location.

docs.lead_paragraph: Four medalists from the Athens Games will lose their medals because officials found evidence of doping in retested urine samples.

headline.seo: Four 2004 Olympians Stripped of Medals in Doping Retest
headline.main: ’04 Drug Retest May Give U.S. Olympic Gold
headline.print_headline: ’04 Drug Retest May Give U.S. Olympic Gold

docs.abstract: Four track and field medalists from the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens will lose their medals because officials found evidence of doping in retested urine samples; silver medalist Adam Nelson of the United States could win the gold medal in the shot put as result.
docs.snippet: Four medalists from the Athens Games will lose their medals because officials found evidence of doping in retested urine samples.

headline.main: Brazil Steps Up Investments in Overlooked Tech Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Brazil Steps Up Investments in Crucial, but Overlooked, Technology Start-Ups

docs.abstract: Because segments considered critical to transforming Brazil's economy have fallen by the wayside, the country has doubled down on its goal of promoting technology growth.
docs.snippet: Because segments considered critical to transforming Brazil's economy have fallen by the wayside, the country has doubled down on its goal of promoting technology growth.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican leaders say they can raise $800 billion in revenue in the first decade by limiting tax breaks, a proposal that analysts say is possible but bound to face political hurdles.

headline.seo: Limiting Tax Deductions May Work, but Not Easily
headline.main: Tax Deduction Limits May Trim Deficits, but Not Easily
headline.print_headline: Limiting Deductions May Work, but Not Easily

docs.abstract: News analysis; House Republican leaders claim that their budget counteroffer can raise $800 billion in revenue within 10 years by limiting tax breaks, proposal that analysts say is possible but not easily achieved.
